BUG_REPORT.bug_report_text: Use this form to report any bugs or issues you encounter on the app.
BUG_REPORT.bug_description_placeholder: Please add as much detail as possible.

HELP.title: Let us know how we can help
HELP.text: We’re here to help and answer any question you might have, We look forward to hearing from you! Please fill out the form, or use the contact information below.

DUPLICATE_COURSE.title: Duplicate course
DUPLICATE_COURSE.duplicate_course_text: Enter the course ID of the course you want to duplicate

pop_confirm.title: Duplicate course
pop_confirm.description: Are you sure you want to duplicate this course?

UPLOADFILES.principal_text: Click or drag file to this area to upload
UPLOADFILES.secondary_text: Support for a single or bulk upload. Strictly prohibited from uploading company data or other banned files.
UPLOADFILES.csv_error: Not a valid email detected in the CSV file. Please check if file format is correct. Renaming the file to .csv may not work.
UPLOADFILES.file_MB: File size must be less than 10MB

COURSESHOME.taskEndSoon: This task is about to end soon on {{end_date}}

objectives.not_objectives: You did not set any objectives for this course
objectives.complete_objective: Are you sure you want to update objective {{objective}}

COURSESHOME.not_courses: There are no courses available for you
COURSESHOME.not_courses_explore: Explore other areas of the platform or check back later for new course options.
COURSESHOME.not_daily_tasks: You do not have any task for today

student_creation_courses.add_course_text: Add a course based on your preferences and customize it.

LEARNING_CAPABILITY.title: Learning capability and responsibility
LEARNING_CAPABILITY.description_with_qualifications: You have already {{qualificationsCount}} qualifications, with an average grade of {{averageGrade}}.
LEARNING_CAPABILITY.description_no_qualifications: You don't have any valid qualifications.

TEAMWORK.title: Team Work
TEAMWORK.description_with_activities: You have completed {{activitiesCount}} team work activities, with an average grade of {{averageGrade}}.
TEAMWORK.description_no_activities: You haven't completed any team work activities.

ETHICAL_COMMITMENT.title: Ethical commitment
ETHICAL_COMMITMENT.description: Before completing this objective, think over the following questions: Are you able to criticize yourself and think critically? Are you able to demonstrate attitudes consistent with ethical and deontological principles?

CREATIVE_CAPACITY.title: Creative and entrepreneurial capacity
CREATIVE_CAPACITY.description: Before completing this objective, think over the following questions: Are you able to formulate, design, and manage projects? Are you able to seek and integrate new knowledge and attitudes?

SUSTAINABILITY.title: Sustainability
SUSTAINABILITY.description: Before completing this objective, think over the following questions: Are you able to assess the social and environmental impact of actions in your field? Are you able to express integrated and systematic visions?

COMMUNICATIVE_ABILITY.title: Communicative ability
COMMUNICATIVE_ABILITY.description: Before completing this objective, think over the following questions: Are you able to understand and express yourself orally and in writing in Catalan and Spanish and in another language, using specialized language in the discipline? Are you able to search, use, and integrate information?

FORUM.guidelines: Remember, contributions to this topic should follow our

ACCORDION.section_will_open: Will open when the last subsection is completed or the {{day}} at {{minute}}

COURSEINSIDE.files_professor: These files are uploaded by the professor if it's necessary for this subsection.
COURSEINSIDE.no_files: There are no files available for this subsection.

PARTICIPANTS.participants_tile: Explora todos los participantes actualmente inscritos en este curso.
PARTICIPANTS.to_add_student: Para agregar un nuevo estudiante, por favor navega a la sección de configuración del curso.

COURSE_INFO.principal_text: First, give us some information about the new course. This information will be visible to students.
